ygData.subject: Archiving only part of a site/scope culling
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello, I was reading https://webarchive.jira.com/wiki/dispay/Heritrix/unexpected+offsite+content and was wondering how tweak Heritrix s settings to only crawl
